channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2912] Service Icons: Change text in "service icons" image
item.description:
Text of service icons (in footer) is wrong:

  • Instead of "Keine Minimumbestellgröße" => "Keine Mindestbestellmenge"
  • Instead of "Bestellung bis um 18:00 Uhr, Lieferung am nächsten Arbeitstag" => "Bestellung bis um 12:00 Uhr, Lieferung am nächsten Arbeitstag"
  • Delete "Online-Chat"
item.summary: Service Icons: Change text in "service icons" image

comments.comment:
Service icons are being saved as an image (JPG), image name/code in hmc is "Service-Icons".

Image has to be adapted and corrected version has to be uploaded to hmc afterwards.

Oana,

could you please assign this ticket to the person responsible to adapt this picture?

Thanks!

Placeholder image for now.

Thus, ticket closed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2880] Missing/wrong redirection for other country pages
item.description: When changing the country setting to e.g. "Sweden", the user is redirected to a 404 page instead of the current Swedish shop
item.summary: Missing/wrong redirection for other country pages

comments.comment:
Adi,
is this a configuration issue? Can you please verify the redirects? (primarily on the P system)
I'm able to reproduce the problem in my local environment. Will analyze the problem on my way back home from MUC.

CMSsite for redirection have been assigned to a different brand (via SalesOrg). Fix can be done via Impex without an additional release.
However, to ensure only countries of the same brand are listed in the country selector, I will create an additional ticket wich can be fixed for v1.1
Fixed. Can already be tested on Q / P.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2931] Change country doesn't work
item.description:
-start on Österreich/DE/EUR/B2B
-click on the link to change the settings
-set country to ch
-Try to set the language, currency or canal

-> it's not possible to choose a language, currency or canal. Further if you click on the button with the wrong content "go to" nothing happens. You will be in the AT shop as before

Win7/IE9

comments.comment: fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2906] Title is showing wrong
item.description:
The title of the page http://test.distrelec.at/de/Netzteile-%26-Licht/Lichtquellen/c/cat-L2D_379659 is showing wrong.

under:
HOME -> Netzteile & Licht -> Lampen / Birnen / Signallampen

comments.comment:
See screenshot_1 and screenshot_2:

- The category name indeed is "Lichtquellen"
- The navigation node is titled "Lampen/Birnen/Signallampen.

Not sure how the navigation tree for the main navigation is being created, but it seems as if the category has been renamed, but there was no update of the navigation tree?
I could rename the navigation node manually, but this might not solve the problem sustainably.

Same problem for category cat-L2D_379668:

- In main navigation: "PC & Mobilgeräte / GSM / GPS / PC-Komponenten"
- Actual category title in hybris: "Drahtlose Kommunikation"
Update mega flyout

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2903] Shipment address not accepted
item.description:
TESTED VERSION: v.0.5.12

OS: Windows 7 Professional
Browser: IE 11.0.9600.16476 / Update Versions: 11.0.2

Change to B2C, add an article into the cart, click on checkout, register as a guest user, fill out the form, click on next, choose use "bill address as shipment address", when click on next the system gives an error message "Please specify a shipment address". (img_342_pzu)

comments.comment: Raphael, can you have a look at this or assign?

Hallo Dishan

Ich habe mir das kurz angeschaut. Also die Adresse wir korrekt angelegt sodass sie Shipping und Billing zugleich ist.
Wieso der Checkout dies jedoch nicht akzeptiert habe ich noch nicht herausgefunden. Kannst du mir das mal kurz anschauen?
Damit du nicht extra wegen dem dann in den Branch wechseln musst, können wirs dann auch kurz anschauen, wenn du es einchecken musst. Dann würde ich das dann für dich machen.
Could not reproduce
The same for me: cannot reproduce. see order: 00000RTQ
Please test again.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2901] Wrong display in settings / wrong redirecction
item.description:
TESTED VERSION: v.0.5.12

OS: Windows 7 Professional
Browser: IE 11.0.9600.16476 / Update Versions: 11.0.2

Change country to Austria, login with user distrelec.testing+8@gmail.com, pw distrelec, put some articles in the cart, go to the header, click on settings, change country to Switzerland --> all the other settings are removed and disabled. After click on button "go to" the opening webpage is from the actual Distrelec web shop, not the new one. (img_34/341_pzu)
item.summary: Wrong display in settings / wrong redirecction

comments.comment: known issue, will take care of it
solved

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2899] Change of County/language/Währung not possible
item.description: Im not able to change country/language and proceed in the new shop. changes to old webshop

comments.comment: fixed

at first sight I was able to navigate and set filters without problems.
Raphael, any clues from the URL that point at a problem?

problem also appears for other categories.

for example (via main navigation flyout):

Computer & Hobby
=>Kabel / Computerkommunikation
=>konfektioniertes Kabel

(category: cat-L3D_526074)

There was an error when facet labels were created.

Issue fixed.

item.summary: The abstract components should not be visible for the Carpet/Hero Rotating Teaser

Raphael,
what is the exact issue? Is it critical for go-live?

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2859] Video covers the menu on landing pages
item.description:
Video covers the menu on landing pages.
Internet Explorer 10

Reported by Angel Munoz
angel.munoz@distrelec.com
item.summary: Video covers the menu on landing pages

comments.comment: Apparently an IE problem? On osx / chrome I do not have this issue.

Hi Jan,

can you please take care of this bug. It seems like an IE problem only. Thank you in advance. Dean.

CMS Page from Printscreen is not available anymore on test.distrelec.at. Tested it on this page: http://test.distrelec.at/de/Service+/cms/sam_service_plus and it seems to work as intended. Tested on IE8,9,10,11.

Cannot reproduce. Please retest or provide access to the page where it happens.

attachment.name: Distrelec AT Website - Windows Internet Explorer_2014-01-22_17-58-40.png
attachment.author: nmueller

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2851] Cookie Sentence - wrong or incomplete:
item.description:
Sentence is wrong or incomplete:

Hallo, wir würden gern diese Einstellungen vornehmen für Ihre

Change to this:
Hallo, wir würden gern diese Einstellungen vornehmen für Ihre Cookies

or this:
Hallo, wir würden gern diese Einstellungen vornehmen für Sie

comments.comment: Fixed in de.properties file
verified and done minor corrections with Raphael Husi.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2845] Auftragsprüfung step of the check out process - Text and Links of the checkboxes
item.description:
The boxes should be named:

Auftragsprüfung step of the check out process
1. Ich habe die AGBs und die Datenschutzbestimmungen zur Kenntnis genommen.
2. Ich habe das Widerrufsrecht zur Kenntnis genommen. Es steht mir ein 7 (sieben) tägiges Widerrufsrecht zu.

http://test.distrelec.at/de/AGB/cms/agb
http://test.distrelec.at/de/Datenschutz/cms/datenschutz
http://test.distrelec.at/de/Widerrufsbelehrung/cms/widerrufsbelehrung
item.summary: Auftragsprüfung step of the check out process - Text and Links of the checkboxes

comments.comment: Fixed in de.properties file.

Error in character set (see "ä" in tägiges).

Links have not been adapted properly.

AGB --> link to "/cms/agb"
Datenschutz --> link to "cms/datenschutz"
Widerrufsbelehrung --> link to "cms/widerrufsbelehrung"
added texts to property files with Raphael Husi

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2798] Split items in family description bullet / series description bullet in populator
item.description:
PIM export contains family description bullet (attributID 5322) and series description bullet (attributeId 5324). Currently the items in the list are not separated and cannot be shown in a bullet list.
As soon as Distrelec has fixed the export DISTRELEC-2649 (by adding a separator) we can fix this issue.
item.summary: Split items in family description bullet / series description bullet in populator

comments.comment: We added #NEWLINE# tag in those attributes, export was sent yesterday.

Pattern #NEWLINE# is used to split values of Family- (5322), Series- (5324) and Article-Bullets (5326).

Issue fixed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2760] Copyright Statement on each page
item.description:
Please disable the link at the footer of each page, from © Distrelec word.

please replace © Distrelec word with:

© 2014 Distrelec Gesellschaft m. b. H. Alle Rechte vorbehalten.

comments.comment:
The footer contents currently are stored in properties (footer.copyright.url and footer.copyright.label).

We can adapt the contents of those properties, however please note that those values are language-specific, but not country-specific.

Oana,

I would be glad about a short confirmation that it is okay with you that Copyright information is language-specific, but not country-specific. Otherwise please let me know asap.

Thanks!

This is bad then. We will always have there the name of the legal entity, that is pecific per country.

If we are to go for plan B, a copyright page, what can we publish there?

From: Matthias Fehske (JIRA) [mailto:AutoMailer@namics.com]
Sent: Dienstag, 21. Januar 2014 10:49
To: Ilie, Oana
Subject: [jira.namics] (DISTRELEC-2760) Copyright Statement on each page

[https://jira.namics.com/s/en_US-j34b09/731/82/_/jira-logo-scaled.png]

[https://jira.namics.com/secure/useravatar?ownerId=mfehske&avatarId=12147]Matthias Fehske<https://jira.namics.com/secure/ViewProfile.jspa?name=mfehske> commented on [Task] DISTRELEC-2760<https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-2760>
Copyright Statement on each page<https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-2760>



The footer contents currently are stored in properties (footer.copyright.url and footer.copyright.label).

We can adapt the contents of those properties, however please note that those values are language-specific, but not country-specific.




This message is automatically generated by JIRA.
If you think it was sent incorrectly, please contact your JIRA administrators<https://jira.namics.com/secure/ContactAdministrators!default.jspa>.
For more information on JIRA, see: http://www.atlassian.com/software/jira

Discussed with Oana:
The properties need to be changed, this needs to be country- and language-specific. Created a ticket: DISTRELEC-2806

Corrected and verified with Raphael Husi:
- correct text now set
- link removed

CR still valid to make this country-specific

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2462] Set tomcat.development.mode to false for production
item.summary: Set tomcat.development.mode to false for production

comments.comment: please consider when deploying to prod
tomcat.development.mode=false

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2425] Information Gathering
item.description:
Compass Penetration Test Reference
6.2 #1-3 / Page 34-36
Threat: Medium

Test 1: Is it possible to identify the product and version that is used for the Web Server / Application Server / Entry Server by inspecting the HTTP Response Headers?
Result 1: Webserver version and web application server versions could be identified when producing an error page.

Test 2: If the version of the used product can be identified: Is the product up-to-date? (Latest patch level applied)
Result 2: Outdated with known vulnerabilities

  • We will have to check if we can upgrade or what dependencies we have with the tomcat version
  • We will have to discuss what the process is for the upgrade and which roles are being played by whom.
  • Customize Error Page without product information

Compass Penetration Test Reference
6.23 #1 / Page 16+196
Threat: Medium

The use of the Webtrekk Technology and HP environment is revealed

comments.comment:
Hallo Önder,

Let's discuss it together when Florian is back.

This is a configuration option from the Apache Web-Server and the Tomcat application server.

Could be fixed by Raphael Husi.
Effort approx. 1PT.

Done!

URLs to test:
- Apache Http
http://dev.distrelec.ch.distrelec.com//Web/WebShopImages/portrait_small/_t/if/ps_951594f.jp

- Apache Tomcat
http://dev.distrelec.ch.distrelec.com/medias/sys_master/h25/h0d/8796203286558/distrelec_logo.pn

item.title: [DISTRELEC-1830] Cleanup of already imported files
item.description: Handling of already imported files (archived files should be zipped, deleted after x days)

comments.comment:
Hi Raphi,

this point appears as we brainstormed what tasks need to done for live going. We either need information what settings are wanted, or you are going to configure this by yourself anyway.

Gruess d

Hi!

These imported files should be handled in hybris the same way they are handled today in the ishop:

- PIM is overwritten,
- Movex is kept one week;

This is confirmed with Florian.

Regards,
Rene, please can you take care of this? If anything is unclear, please check with Raphael.

: Hotfolder:
hybris\data\acceleratorservices\import\distrelec\erp\archive
hybris\data\acceleratorservices\import\distrelec\erp_movex_ascii\archive
hybris\data\acceleratorservices\import\distrelec\erp_movex_utf8\archive
hybris\data\acceleratorservices\import\distrelec\pim\archive

BE done. @Raphi, please create the configuration for each environment with the hotfolder location, with following keys:

file.cleanup.erp.import=C:/project_distrelec/env/trunk/hybris/data/acceleratorservices/import/distrelec/erp/archive
file.cleanup.erp.mvx.ascii.import=C:/project_distrelec/env/trunk/hybris/data/acceleratorservices/import/distrelec/erp_movex_ascii/archive
file.cleanup.erp.mvx.utf8.import=C:/project_distrelec/env/trunk/hybris/data/acceleratorservices/import/distrelec/erp_movex_utf8/archive
file.cleanup.pim.import=C:/project_distrelec/env/trunk/hybris/data/acceleratorservices/import/distrelec/pim/import/archive

Hi Dishan

The paths are the same for all environments. I added the config to environment/common/hybris/conf/local.properties as following:

#-------------------------------------------------------------------
# Hotfolder cleanup
#-------------------------------------------------------------------
file.cleanup.erp.import=${HYBRIS_DATA_DIR}/acceleratorservices/import/distrelec/erp/archive
file.cleanup.erp.mvx.ascii.import=${HYBRIS_DATA_DIR}/acceleratorservices/import/distrelec/erp_movex_ascii/archive
file.cleanup.erp.mvx.utf8.import=${HYBRIS_DATA_DIR}/acceleratorservices/import/distrelec/erp_movex_utf8/archive
file.cleanup.pim.import=${HYBRIS_DATA_DIR}/acceleratorservices/import/distrelec/pim/archive
I disabled zipping of PIM-files. As discussed I'm assigning you the ticket to setup a unix cronjob which does the zipping.

10 1 * * * hybris find /data/project_distrelec/hybrisserver/hybris/data/acceleratorservices/import/distrelec/*/archive -type f -mtime +14 -exec rm -f {} \;
20 1 * * * hybris find /data/project_distrelec/hybrisserver/hybris/data/acceleratorservices/import/distrelec/*/archive -type f -name \*.log -mtime +0 -exec gzip {} \;
30 1 * * * hybris find /data/project_distrelec/hybrisserver/hybris/data/acceleratorservices/import/distrelec/*/error -type f -mtime +30 -exec rm -f {} \;
40 1 * * * hybris find /data/project_distrelec/hybrisserver/hybris/data/acceleratorservices/import/distrelec/*/error -type f -name \*.log -mtime +0 -exec gzip {} \;

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2822] IE8: No credit card selectable during checkout
item.description:
OS: Windows 7 Professional
Browser: IE 8.0.7601.17514
TS-27.61

B2C store, add some products to the cart, checkout, register as guest customer, choose credit card as payment option, on step 4 in checkout, there is no possibility to select a credit card, the drop down will not open. Try to checkout without credit card will end in an unknown error. (img_325-328_pzu)
item.summary: IE8: No credit card selectable during checkout

comments.comment: Hi René, aus meiner Sicht ein Backend Problem. In letzter Zeit wurde im Frontend nur noch angemalt und funktional nichts verändert.
Scheint ein IE8 Problem zu sein.
Resolved by adding a HTML 5 Doctype. Sent Templates to DeuCS via Email, will be on test.distrelec.at ~ 28.02.104
Check IE8 Scrollbars
